0.1.name: wordpress/screenr
0.1.description:
The Screenr oEmbed allows get the Screenr embed code for any Screenr screencast.

If you have the URL to a Screenr screencast you can use it to get the embed code without copying and pasting anything, you simply provide a Screenr URL to our oEmbed API and in return you’ll get the proper embed code.

Embedding a screencast

Paste the url (Example: http://www.screenr.com/oXs) in a new Post.

It's as simple as that!
